values: Its funny how things can change in a week, and all it takes is one mistake. If you could go back in time and change the mistake would it have changed the future outcome of a single problem? Its funny how your life can change by every choice you make but in the long run the problems are still the same no matter what.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/5775.html

I can't believe I am finally graduating.Its crazy.It feels like just yesterday I was a kid with no responsibilities wishing for this day to come, now that its here its like where has the time gone. I just wish my grandma could be there so she could see me get my diploma and tell me how proud of me she was. I can't wait for Monday its gonna be awesome.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/5417.html

Ever wounder where the time in your life has gone its like one minute your a kid and next minute your an adult.I feel like time is going by to fast and I just want to slow it down for a moment to realize what is happening.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/5332.html

someone asked me what my life means to me...for a while i didn't know how to reply..but now i think i do..what my life means to me is that i was put here to do something great along the way there are obstacles that i must over come..but my life also means to live everyday to my fullest to live everyday like its my last...i thought that question was interesting cause it made me thing
http://theshort.livejournal.com/5091.html

ever feel like you keep screwing up as a friend...like everything you do brings the people close to you further and further away...its like no matter what i do i keep screwing up...i was once told i was a good friend but a lot of the time i feel like i am not.i think i am gonna disappear from my friends for a while..my life is going to be school work and karate on some days.distancing myself from people i think should do me some good.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/4823.html

my life changed, i was put here to do something great with my life and i started to screw things up by doing very stupid things and, i finally understand what was so great that i would be doing with my life. being a fire fighter is my calling. for a while i felt like my life was crashing down on me. i made some mistakes but i got through them, and i am glad i did. i am finally ready to put the past behind me and move on. the pain i felt is now gone. i still miss a big part of my past, but that part of me will always stay in my heart forever.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/4432.html

so i decided i am going to post some poetry that i wrote here is one of my poems:


You can close your eyes 
to things you don't want to see, 
but you cant close your
heart to things you don't 
want to feel

Some say my future is one thing some say it is something else..Is my future what I want it to be or is it already set in stone where nothing can be changed?

Grrrrr... i am sick again ..it sucks ass

i feel like i am going nuts.things are happening and i can't explain.i know what i feel but yet i cant explain it.

wisdom teeth are starting to grow in and they hurt

dude this sucks i am sick.i hate it when someone at school gets sick cause they pass it around the whole school. grrrr.

I did it i finished my speech for my friends wedding.so i am happy about that.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/2678.html

is it wrong to try and give somebody a second chance even though they have betrayed your trust?how do u trust them again how do you know they wont do it to you again?can they even be trusted?so many thoughts are going through my head about this and i dont know if i should consider it cause i dont want to be mixed up in all the bs again.it hurt losing a good friend but it hurt more knowing that they betrayed your trust.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/2538.html

so apparently  i have to give a speech at my friends wedding and i have no clue how to start it...this should be fun...i mean i dont mind doing it i just dont know what to put in it...i want to write a good speech but this should be the most interesting paper/speech i will ever have to write.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/2241.html
why is it everything i do pushes the people i care about away?
http://theshort.livejournal.com/1974.html

The first day of school was great. got some cool teachers and i get to leave early. i actually cant wait for the rest of this school year. for once i dont want to sleep in class. My last year of high school is gonna be great.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/1769.html

Right now with everything that has happened within the past 24 hours i am like so glad i have the friends i have they saved my ass twice in the same day..car broke down they came and helped out with that and then that same day i locked myself out of my brothers apartment and they came and got the door unlocked by helping me break in with out my 2 very good friends i don't know what i would have done with out them.i owe them a lot right now.its been like a day of hell.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/1327.html

dude it feels like everyone is leaving and moving away.its like no one stays around anymore.like i know these people dont have a choice but it still sucks seeing a good friend move away its like after they leave you wonder if you'll ever see them again.someone i know once said people always leave i never believed that person until now,and you cant help but wounder who's next its not something you want to think about but you cant help but wounder anyways.its always the good people that you with the rest of the world.at least i still got my friend family who is more family to me than my own.it still sucks that people always leave.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/1242.html

So like i am great full i have  good friends cause last night one of my friends saved me  from something . its weird though being able to count on someone  haven't had that in a while.i don't know what i would do with out my friends cause for some reason they put up with me and they are always there to back me up.
http://theshort.livejournal.com/913.html

Its almost 3 in the mourning and I cant sleep. To much on my mind i guess. Feeling trapped within myself and I can't escape who I've become or who I am turning into. I don't know what i am going to become. All i know is that what ever it is its going to destroy me. People tell me we can sometimes see whats ahead I saw whats in store for me. I have been given a deed that I must do and that's all I can so towards that. Anyways its like what ever dude. Well its 3 in the mourning now so I think i am going to sleep.

Until My Next Entry This Is:

The Short
